Name: Sergeant Pixel
Description: Forged in the depths of the digital realm, Sergeant Pixel is a tactical genius with a heart of code. This member of the WebtrES club boasts a shiny black chassis that reflects the glimmer of virtual battlegrounds. Adorned with buttons that resemble the uniform of a seasoned soldier, he commands digital troops with precision and authority. His articulated soldier limbs are always ready for action, and his screen flickers with red and black hues, indicating his readiness for any cyber skirmish. With a steely resolve and an unbreakable will, Sergeant Pixel is the protector of the net and a true warrior of the WebtrES club.
